S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-3202: 'AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission C:\....\file-2.log read)' in ErrorStreamTest.
Problem was that getCanonicalPath() needed a security permission on Windows (but not on Solaris/Linux). In addition the Derby engine had to be shut down before derby.log could be deleted on Windows.
Fix contributed by Vemund Ã˜stgaard.
